title: Has anyone thought "yay I have a brand support"?
body: Instead of "fuck I have a brand support". I think brand support is a completely selfish pick, because people only pick him as support because of his damage. Most brand supports I get go ignite for maximum kill securing. Some of them don't even get sightstone because it delays their damage. The worst part about it is rito actually condones this playstyle. They even had brand on the 10 support free rotation event.

replies.body: they tend to flame a lot too
Man, you are on fire today. ^_^
has anyone ever thought "yay i have X support" for that matter?

I love having/playing Leona support
As long as they aren't a braindead monkey pressing E the second it's off cooldown
fair enough, i always feel indifferent as to which support my lane partner takes (unless im with friends and were going kill lane).
Yes the tend to be better players then the {{champion:40}}  and {{champion:16}}  sitting back hitting W every now and then

[Once, and I was extremely thankful](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2315970930/200604827?tab=overview)

Our team was:
{{champion:427}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:63}} 

Quite frankly, I was extremely thankful that we had Jinx and Brand bottom lane since our team was otherwise lacking damage.  I just camped bottom lane for most of the game and snowballed them.
...I am so sorry for that Ivern.

The game occurred shortly after Ivern's release so it wasn't exactly unexpected.

I'm just thankful I managed to gank for top-lane enough to prevent him from feeding even while camping bottom lane.
I've always been like "Fuuuuuuck, Brand support" when I play against it because he's an absolute terror against tank supports or excessively squishy supports.
People are like "YAY i have a sona" when i play >.> sometimes.... like 1 out of 10 games.... divided by 100... minus 1.
